description: This file defines a React functional component for the dashboard page of a medical prescription verification app. It handles user authentication, displays prescriptions based on user roles ('doctor', 'patient', 'pharmacy'), and includes interaction with the application's API and components like PrescriptionForm, PrescriptionList, and VerificationCard.

methods.name: DashboardPage
methods.description: Main React component for the user dashboard page, managing prescription data and role-based UI rendering.
